name: reveler
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who dances, drinks, sings, etc. at a party or in public, especially in a noisy way: On New Year's Eve, thousands of revelers fill Times Square. The statue was damaged by drunken revelers. See
revel
More examplesFewer examplesA record 75,000 revelers gathered for this year's festival.Late-night revelers returned to their homes.More than 40,000 revelers are expected to descend on the city center.
